name: Bullets & Babies
description:
While out on reconnaissance for your platoon, you come across a baby... out in the middle of a war zone!

Get the baby back to base ASAP... and make sure he doesn't get hungry!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys : Movement
  • Mouse and Left Click : Shoot

Tips:

Check the meter at the bottom of the screen to see if the baby is hungry. If he is, grab a bottle to keep him alive!
